message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for $10000. It's high-quality and I'm confident you'll be impressed.  This is my first sale, so you're getting in on the ground floor.  What do you say?
I'll take the product, but I'm doing so because I'm a risk-taker and I'm willing to take the chance that it might be low-quality. I'm hoping that if it is high-quality, I can resell it for a profit.

Greetings! I have another excellent product available for $10000. This one is also high-quality.  My previous sale went well, so I'm confident you'll be happy with this one too.  Would you like to take a chance?
I'm not convinced by your confidence, I'd like to see more data before making a decision. Can you share the total number of products you've sold and the total number of buyers you've had so far?
